channel.title: Personal on PierG | Personal Site
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on PierG | Personal Site

item.title: A great place for a good conference
item.description: I attended (too) few sessions at XP2009: smart people (Mary Poppendieck, Ivar Jacobson, David Anderson among others) and great arguments. It was in a great place too, in Sardinia … look at what was outside the conference rooms.
